text.section: In ordering emergency protective services, the court shall authorize only that intervention which it finds to be the least restrictive of the individual's liberty and rights while consistent with his welfare and safety.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 370, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 372, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
